Document:
(CNN) -- A man who survived 13 months adrift in the Pacific Ocean after his boat sank has arrived in the United States, officials said Friday. Jose Salvador Alvarenga, 55, arrived Thursday night on the Marshall Islands, where he was picked up by a fishing boat, said the U.S. Embassy in Majuro. He will fly to the U.S. on Monday, embassy spokesman John Biehl said. Alvarenga told CNN affiliate KGMB that he was on a fishing trip with a friend when a storm blew them off course. He said his friend died, and he ran out of food and water. "I had no choice but to eat my companion," he said. "I ate him raw." Alvarenga said he drank rainwater and urine to survive. He arrived at Majuro Atoll on March 1, but authorities did not realize he was an American until he tested positive for tuberculosis, Biehl said. He had no identification. The U.S. State Department issued a bulletin alerting U.S. citizens in the Marshall Islands to be on the lookout for Alvarenga, who could be carrying a weapon. The U.S. Embassy in Majuro has been in contact with the fishing boat's captain and will help Alvarenga find shelter and food, Biehl said. Alvarenga told KGMB that he was on a fishing trip with a friend when a storm blew them off course. He said his friend died, and he ran out of food and water. Easter Triduum is the three-day period that begins with Good Friday, continues through Holy Saturday, and ends with Easter Sunday .
Maundy Thursday is the day when Jesus celebrated the Last Supper with his disciples .
Good Friday is the day of the crucifixion, when Jesus was scourged and beaten .
Holy Saturday is a passageway between the darkness of the crucifixion and the bright hope of Easter .

The devices are fitted with a camera and pepper spray and cost between $9,560 and $19,300 .

"Grace of Monaco" is heading straight to Lifetime .

Only the death reported so far in two days of tornado touchdowns .

reference_summaries:
Membership gives the ICC jurisdiction over alleged crimes committed in Palestinian territories since last June .
Israel and the United States opposed the move, which could open the door to war crimes investigations against Israelis .

Theia, a bully breed mix, was apparently hit by a car, whacked with a hammer and buried in a field .
"She's a true miracle dog and she deserves a good life," says Sara Mellado, who is looking for a home for Theia .

Mohammad Javad Zarif has spent more time with John Kerry than any other foreign minister .
He once participated in a takeover of the Iranian Consulate in San Francisco .
The Iranian foreign minister tweets in English .

17 Americans were exposed to the Ebola virus while in Sierra Leone in March .
Another person was diagnosed with the disease and taken to hospital in Maryland .
National Institutes of Health says the patient is in fair condition after weeks of treatment .

Student is no longer on Duke University campus and will face disciplinary review .
School officials identified student during investigation and the person admitted to hanging the noose, Duke says .
The noose, made of rope, was discovered on campus about 2 a.m.

College-bound basketball star asks girl with Down syndrome to high school prom .
Pictures of the two during the "prom-posal" have gone viral .

Amnesty's annual death penalty report catalogs encouraging signs, but setbacks in numbers of those sentenced to death .
Organization claims that governments around the world are using the threat of terrorism to advance executions .
The number of executions worldwide has gone down by almost 22% compared with 2013, but death sentences up by 28% .

Andrew Getty's death appears to be from natural causes, police say, citing coroner's early assessment .
In a petition for a restraining order, Getty had written he had a serious medical condition.
Police say this is not a criminal matter at this time .

Once a super typhoon, Maysak is now a tropical storm with 70 mph winds .

Bob Barker returned to host "The Price Is Right" on Wednesday .
Barker, 91, had retired as host in 2007 .

London's Metropolitan Police say the man was arrested at Luton airport after landing on a flight from Istanbul .

"Furious 7" pays tribute to star Paul Walker, who died during filming .

Museum: Anne Frank died earlier than previously believed .

Anne and older sister Margot Frank are believed to have died in February 1945 .

Singing the national anthem is a risky proposition .
Whitney Houston nailed it; Roseanne Barr destroyed it .

The singer had been off the scene for a while .

A South Carolina man says he spent 66 days alone at sea before being rescued .

The total eclipse will only last 4 minutes and 43 seconds .

Terrorist group Al-Shabaab has attacked a Kenyan college, killing and taking hostages .

Why is the date different every year, and what does it have to do with the moon?
